name: Dr. Jonathan Wong
description: Dr. Wong has many years of experience treating and diagnosing illnesses.

name: Dr. Isabel Lee
description: Dr. Lee has been quoted in various medical journals for her research in treating Osteoporosis. She has three years of experience in Hong Kong.

name: Dr. Kevin Zhao
description: Dr. Zhao has performed heart surgeries for over 500 people in his 25 years as a Doctor.

name: Mr. Brian Johnson
description: Mr. Johnson is a relied upon and important senior member of the HKU medical staff.
